Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Although PBDT-TDPP-S contains bulky and rigid side chains , its blend film with PC71BM exhibited a high hole mobility of 3.8 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 .

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high hole mobility |
| 3.8 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |

Note that I have included both the property name itself ("high hole mobility") and the specific value given for that property ("3.8 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1") as entities, since both are mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the paragraph and the entities identified, I have determined that both of the entities I previously identified are indeed material properties.

The first entity, "high hole mobility," is a property of the material blend film that is being described. It is a measure of how easily holes (positive charges) can move through the material.

The second entity, "3.8 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1," is the specific value given for the "high hole mobility" property. It is a unit of measurement for the mobility of charges in a material.

Therefore, I will present the same entities as before, in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| high hole mobility |
| 3.8 × 10^-4 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |
